prog: (PARI) contfrac(exp(2))(PARI) allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 95000); x=contfrac(exp(2)); for (n=1, 20001, write("b001204.txt", n-1, " ", x[n])); \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Apr 30 2009
